mapper.sql: id, employee_id, user_id, name, department_code, gender, employdate, remaining_days, comment, createdate, updatedate
mapper.insert: insert into employee (id, employee_id, user_id, name, department_code, gender, employdate, remaining_days, comment, createdate, updatedate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remainingDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into employee
id,
employee_id,
user_id,
name,
department_code,
gender,
employdate,
remaining_days,
comment,
createdate,
updatedate,

mapper.update:
update employee
employee_id = #{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_code = #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
employdate = #{employdate,jdbcType=DATE},
remaining_days = #{remainingDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE},
updatedate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=DATE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update employee set employee_id = #{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_code = #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, employdate = #{employdate,jdbcType=DATE}, remaining_days = #{remainingDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, updatedate = #{updatedate,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select b.* from (select row_number() over (partition by name order by createdate desc) as 'rowid', a.* from employee a) b where b.rowid=1
